text: Wander is a narrative-focused massively multiplayer online game developed by Loki Davison and an independent team in Australia. Set in a peaceful fantasy setting populated by shapeshifters, Wander encourages players to reveal more of the story by cooperatively exploring new areas of the game world. Upon release, Wander was criticized for being buggy and incomplete. It got a 4/10 from Push Square. ==References== ==External links== * Official website ** Facebook page ** Twitter page Category:2015 video games Category:Fantasy video games Category:Indie video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Steam Greenlight games Category:Video games developed in Australia Category:Windows games
title: Wander (2015 video game)
